entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Comox
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:03 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 11:26 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 4.9°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
